Rulings.Base:
1. The effect to Special Summon can still be used during the Damage Step, even if your monster is destroyed by a card effect instead of battle.
2. You can Special Summon a monster with this effect when you destroy your opponent's "Amazoness" monster and send it to the GY.
3. If a face-down "Amazoness" monster is destroyed, you can activate the effect to Special Summon.
4. You refer to the printed Level of the "Amazoness" monster when deciding on a monster to Summon.
